content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Lab at position(x=unknown)
Consists of lab entity at unknown position, connected to power network with ElectricityGroup(id=4319, poles=[(x=2.5,y=2.5),(x=4.5,y=5.5),(x=8.5,y=9.5),(x=2.5,y=1.5)], voltage=0)

### Burner Inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of burner inserter entity at position(x=3.5, y=0.5), connected to wooden chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### Burner Inserter at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of burner inserter entity at position(x=0.5, y=3.5), connected to wooden chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### Steam Engine at position(x=6.5, y=6.5)
Consists of steam engine entity at position(x=6.5, y=6.5), not connected to power network

### Furnace group at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of stone furnace entity at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0), stone furnace entity at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0), stone furnace entity at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0), stone furnace entity at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0), stone furnace entity at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Burner Mining Drill group at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of burner mining drill entity at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0), connected to wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5) and stone furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to place the entity before placing it, as the max distance is 10.

### Errors when placing entities in occupied tiles
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it, as there might be an existing object in the way.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Check if the entity has available space before inserting items, as the inventory might be full.
- Check if the entity accepts the item you are trying to insert, as some entities might not accept certain items.

### Errors when using entities without necessary items
- Check if you have the necessary items in your inventory before using an entity, as some entities require specific items to function.

### Errors when connecting entities to power network
- Ensure that the entity is connected to the power network, as some entities require power to function.
